title: Ukraine live updates: Russian troops step up attacks on cities
content:
1. Ukraine live updates: Russian troops step up attacks on cities  USA TODAY
  2. Ukraine accuses Russia of bringing Belarus into war after missile launches from northern neighbor  Fox News
  3. Russia hits Ukraine, including Kyiv, with long-range missile strikes  NPR
  4. Russia strikes Kyiv as troops consolidate gains in the east  The Associated Press
  5. The Russian army is drawing forces to Sloviansk, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are ready - the head of the Military Administration  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
